The feather floats under a passing car, then is sent flying back up in the air. A MAN sits on a bus bench. The feather floats above the ground and finally lands on the man's mudsoaked shoe. The man reached down and picks up the feather. His name is FORREST GUMP. He looks at the feather oddly, moves aside a box of chocolates from an old suitcase, then opens the case. Inside the old suitcase are an assortment of clothes, a pingpong paddle, toothpaste and other personal items. Forrest pulls out a book titled "Curious George," then places the feather inside the book. Forrest closes the suitcase. Something in his eyes reveals that Forrest may not be all there. dialogue.raw_text: Hey Forrest...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey Bubba...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm gonna lean up against you, you just lean right back against me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This way, we don't have to sleep with our heads in the mud. You know why we a good partnership, Forrest? 'Cause we be watchin' out for one another. Like brothers and stuff. Hey, Forrest, there's somethin' I've been thinkin' about. I got a very important question to ask you. How would you like to go into the shrimpin' business with me?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Man, I tell you what, I got it all figured out, too. So many pounds of shrimp to pay off the boat, so many pounds for gas, we can just live right on the boat. We ain't got to pay no rent. I'll be the captain; we can just work it together. Split everything right down the middle. Man, I'm tellin' you, fifty-fifty. And, hey, Forrest, all the shrimp you can get.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's a fine idea.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Bubba did have a fine idea.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) I even wrote Jenny and told her all about it. I sent her letters. Not every day, but almost. I told her what I was doin' and asked her what she was doing, and I told her how I thought about her always.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Jenny steps out of the trailer with a backpack and a guitar. She hugs a hippie guy, then jumps into the back of a Volkswagen bus with another guy.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) And how I was looking forward to getting a letter from her just as soon as she had the time I'd always let her know that I was okay.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Forrest writes a letter in his tent.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Then I'd sign each letter, "Love, Forrest Gump."
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Fourth Platoon makes their way through the jungle and rain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest looks up as the sun suddenly appears. Forrest's platoon is attacked. A bullet kills the soldier standing next to Forrest. Bombs explode all around as the soldiers scramble to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest crawls over a berm as bullets fly overhead and explode all around him. Forrest rolls over and pulls his pack off Lt. Dan lies next to Forrest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two soldiers with a machine gun fire into the jungle. Lt. Dan shouts into the radio. Forrest begins firing his weapon into the jungle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two soldiers pull a wounded soldier into the jungle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The machine gunner fires into the treeline. Another soldier helps him with the ammunition. The machine gun jams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A rocket explodes on the machine gunner and the other soldier, killing them. Forrest looks down and covers his head as rockets explodes all around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lt. Dan gets up and grabs Forrest by the collar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The platoon gets up and runs toward the cover of the jungle. Rockets explode all around the field. Forrest runs into the jungle. The soldiers run through the jungle as bullets explode all around. A soldier is blown up by a rocket. A soldier runs through the jungle. Forrest runs past the soldier.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rockets explode in the jungle as Forrest runs out toward a clearing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest turns around, then runs back into the jungle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rockets explode in the jungle. Forrest runs back into the jungle to look for Bubba.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest stops and aims his weapon. He looks around, scared.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something moves. Forrest turns and looks, then rushes over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tex lies on the ground, his face distorted with pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest reaches down and picks up Tex from the ground. Forrest pulls Tex up over his shoulder, then runs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest carries Tex out of the jungle and into the clearing. He sets Tex down on the bank of a river, and runs back into the jungle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest drops another wounded soldier down at the bank of the river next to Tex, and then runs back toward the jungle. Forrest grabs the third wounded soldier up from the ground and turns him over. It is DALLAS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dallas is dropped off at the bank next to the other wounded soldiers. Forrest turns to go back to the jungle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest trips over something and falls to the ground. He looks up to find two bloody legs. It is Lt. Dan, who is wounded. He speaks into the radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest tries to pick up Lt. Dan, who tries to push Forrest away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest pulls Lt. Dan over his shoulder and runs through the jungle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest falls down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest gets up as Lt. Dan yells. Lt. Dan fires his pistol at the unseen enemy as Forrest pulls him away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest drops Lt. Dan down at the bank, next to the other wounded soldiers. Lt. Dan grabs Forrest by the shirt, angry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest gets up and runs as Lt. Dan yells after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest runs through the jungle searching for Bubba. Forrest slows down and looks around carefully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bubba looks up as he lies on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bubba holds a palm frond over his wound. Forrest removes the frond to look at the wound. Bubba's chest has been blown open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest looks around as he hear the voices of the enemy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest carries Bubba through the jungle. The sound of approaching planes fills the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The roar of approaching planes is deafening. Forrest looks up in fear. Three planes dive down toward the jungle. They fire napalm as the jungle explodes with massive fireballs. Forrest runs, carrying Bubba. The fireballs explode behind him. The entire jungle area is in flames as Forrest runs. Forrest carries Bubba to the bank of the river. Lt. Dan and the other wounded soldiers wait for a rescue helicopter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forrest looks down at Bubba. A soldier releases a smoke canister.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The helicopter fly overhead.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: "There's something happenin' here. What it is ain't exactly clear. There's a man with a gun over there, telling' me I got to beware."

dialogue.raw_text: No sweat, man. Just lay back. You're gonna be okay. You're gonna be okay.

dialogue.raw_text: . DAN (into radio) Roger, Strongarm, I know my position is danger close! We got Charlie all over this area! I gotta have those fast movers in here now! Over!

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) Bubba was my best good friend. And even I know that ain't something you can find just around the corner. Bubba was gonna be a shrimpin' boat captain, but instead he died right there by that river in Vietnam.

dialogue.raw_text: That's all I have to say about that.

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, yes sir. Bit me directly in the buttocks. They said it was a million dollar wound, but the Army must keep that money, 'cause I still ain't seen a nickel of that million dollars. The only good thing about being wounded in the buttocks...

direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) ...is the ice cream. They gave me all the ice cream I could eat. And guess what. A good friend of mine was in the bed right next door.

direction.raw_text: Forrest looks at the crowd as he speaks. A policeman looks around as he sneaks over to the audio circuit board.

Forrest continues to speak into the microphone, even though no one can hear what he is saying. Hilary looks over and notices the policeman. Hilary rushes over toward the audio board, pushes the policeman away and grabs his night stick. Another protester grabs the policeman and pulls him away.

direction.raw_text: Hilary plugs in the right patch cord.
